title: This come up when i try to buy rp Error: You have encountered an error. Please try again later.
body: Error: You have encountered an error. Please try again later." Help me

replies.body: That's odd, I'm wondering if there might be an issue with the method of payment.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case, and our billing team can look into this with you individually.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
